body_html: We need to document this properly, but if you're using bazel, find the right .cc file and add it to android_extended_ops_group1 or 2 in tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD, and add it to tensorflow/contrib/makefile/tf_op_files.txt too for the makefile build.
body_text: We need to document this properly, but if you're using bazel, find the right .cc file and add it to android_extended_ops_group1 or 2 in tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD, and add it to tensorflow/contrib/makefile/tf_op_files.txt too for the makefile build.
body: We need to document this properly, but if you're using bazel, find the right .cc file and add it to android_extended_ops_group1 or 2 in tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD, and add it to tensorflow/contrib/makefile/tf_op_files.txt too for the makefile build.
